Cloning (and improving) the Netflix landing page

Cloning the netflix.com landing page by coding it from scratch seemed like a good project to put some of my most used skills into practice.

The process of cloning the page showed that it already had many design issues. Here they are and my fixes to them:

  • The footer has 4 sets of links. On mobile screen their order is messed and they are crammed together. I had the order issue fixed and gave the links some space to breathe.
  • Related to the above, a set of 4 links () disappears completely on medium screens, I fixed that issue as well

And here are some improvements I made to the design:

  • The original page has a single animation, and it is not smooth at all. I added some subtle, smooth animations that improved the overall UI/UX of the design.
  • I added a loading screen with a fun animation, it was found that this increases the conversion rate (proof).
